Events that occurred on 23 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1924 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1925 - Rayner Unwin is born.
1931 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1932 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1934 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to G.H. Cowling.
1936 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1940 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.
1956 - The sixth and final episode of 1956 radio series of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.
1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 253.
2000 - Actor Billy Barty dies.
2003 - Parma Eldalamberon issue 14 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
